pnp:ContentType.Name: SharePoint Server Workflow Task
pnp:ContentType.Description: A work item created by a workflow that you or your team needs to complete.

Field.Description: Go over any notes or information with the Night Auditor.
Field.Name: Communicate

Field.Description: Fill out "Opening" Cashier Report completely. Make sure you have change. If you need change ask the AGM or GM. You are responsible for the cash drawer! **CHECK FRONT DESK EMAIL (GMAIL) FOR NEW RESERVATIONS, CC AUTHORIZATION FORMS, ETC.
